snippet: Can the world expect a real change in policy at a time of daunting domestic and international challenges?
abstract: Editorial questions whether world can expect real change in policy from China's new leadership, led by presumptive leader Xi Jinping, or whether it will stick to recalcitrant policies favored by Pres Hu Jintao.
lead_paragraph: Can the world expect a real change in policy at a time of daunting domestic and international challenges?

headline.seo: Will China’s New Leaders Offer Real Change?
